mapper.select: SELECT m_motorcycle.motorcycle_no, m_motorcycle.motorcycle_name, m_motorcycle.seat_height, m_motorcycle.cylinders, m_motorcycle.cooling, m_motorcycle.price, m_motorcycle.comment, m_motorcycle.version, m_motorcycle.insert_date, m_motorcycle.update_date, m_brand.brand_id, m_brand.brand_name FROM m_motorcycle LEFT OUTER JOIN m_brand ON m_motorcycle.brand_id = m_brand.brand_id WHERE m_motorcycle.motorcycle_no = #{motorcycleNo}
SELECT MAX(m_motorcycle.motorcycle_no) + 1 FROM m_motorcycle FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_motorcycle ( motorcycle_no, motorcycle_name, seat_height, cylinders, cooling, price, comment, version, insert_date, brand_id ) VALUES ( #{motorcycleNo}, #{motorcycleName}, #{seatHeight}, #{cylinders}, #{cooling}, #{price}, #{comment}, 1, NOW(), #{brand.brandId} )
